author: Jason E. Clapham
description: Rum funkiness and amaro bitterness combine in the bittersweet after-dinner sipper. For a less potent version use cacha√ßa in place of the over-proof rum.
name: Black River
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
